Arc - class uwcse.graphics.Arc.
An arc shape.
Arc() - Constructor for class uwcse.graphics.Arc
Create an unfilled yellow arc with a default position, size, and angle.
Arc(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class uwcse.graphics.Arc
Create an unfilled black arc whose bounding rectangle has the specified upper-left corner and dimensions and with the specified start angle and arc angle.
Arc(int, int, int, int, int, int, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class uwcse.graphics.Arc
Create an arc with the given color and filledness whose bounding rectangle has the specified upper-left corner and dimensions and with the specified start angle and arc angle.
